name: Flatuicolor.css
body: flatuicolor.css =============== # Flat UI Color CSS ## See in action [DEMO] ## Usage To use flatuicolor.css in your website, simply drop the stylesheet into your document's `````` , and add the classes to an element you wish to color. That's it! ``` ``` There are 3 sections of styling: background-color (.bg-color-name), border-color (.border-color-name) and color (.text-color-name). Just use section name + color name in your code. Pick name of the color you'd like to use from [Flat Color Picker] ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
